DOC.brief_summary: This is randomised, controlled study about effects of acupuncture on blood pressure and endothelial dysfunction in stage I hypertension patient without medication. Subject will receive 8 weeks of either acupuncture or sham acupuncture, measuring FMD and blood test before and after treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Acupuncture at ST36 and PC6 on Blood Pressure and Endothelial Dysfunction in Hypertensive Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients age 1870 diagnosed stage I hypertension ( JNC7) without taking hypertensive medication Secondary hypertension DM History of cardiovascular disease Taking hypertensive medication Taking hyperlipidemic medication Smoking Pregnancy or feeding woman Cannot follow indication or there is no agreement of patient and conservator Investigator decide Inappropriate to trial
